biolockj.module

Class ScriptModuleImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ScriptModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AwkFastaConverter, BuildQiimeMapping, ClassifierModuleImpl, Gunzipper, JavaModuleImpl, MergeOtuTables, PearMergeReads, R_Module

    public abstract class ScriptModuleImpl
extends BioModuleImpl
implements ScriptModule
    Superclass for Java BioModules that will be called in separate instances of the application.

      Validate module dependencies: Require Config. exists Require Config. is positive integer Require Config. is positive integer Verify Config. is Y/N if set Verify Config. is positive integer if set

      Build the nested list of bash script lines that will be used by BashScriptBuilder to build the worker scripts.
      String[] getJobParams()
      Many ScriptModules generate bash or R scripts for the Operating System to run as a Job.
      The Job creates a Process using the parameters supplied by this method and executed in the Runtime environment.
      Parameters typically contain the full script path and script parameters, if needed.

      Returns moduleDir/script which contains all scripts generated by the module.

    • Method Detail

      • buildScript

        public abstract List<List<String>> buildScript(List<File> files)
                                        throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: ScriptModule
        Method returns a nested list of bash script lines to classify samples containing forward reads only. The inner list contains the bash script lines required to classify 1 sample.
        Specified by:
        buildScript in interface ScriptModule
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only forward reads
        Returns:
        Nested list of bash scripts lines
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to generate script lines

      • buildScriptForPairedReads

        public List<List<String>> buildScriptForPairedReads(List<File> files)
                                             throws Exception
        The default behavior is the same for paired or unpaired data. This method must be overridden to create separate scripts for paired datasets.
        Specified by:
        buildScriptForPairedReads in interface ScriptModule
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only paired reads
        Returns:
        Nested list of bash scripts lines
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to generate the script lines

        • Require Config. exists
        • Require Config. is positive integer

        • Verify Config. is Y/N if set

      • executeTask

        public void executeTask()
                 throws Exception
        Build the nested list of bash script lines that will be used by BashScriptBuilder to build the worker scripts. If running Docker, return DockerUtil.buildDockerScript(String), else passBioModuleImpl.getInputFiles() to either buildScript(List) or buildScriptForPairedReads(List) based on Config."internal.pairedReads".
        Specified by:
        executeTask in interface BioModule
        Specified by:
        executeTask in class BioModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if the module is unable to complete is task

      • getJobParams

        public String[] getJobParams()
                      throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: ScriptModule
        Many ScriptModules generate bash or R scripts for the Operating System to run as a Job.
        The Job creates a Process using the parameters supplied by this method and executed in the Runtime environment.
        Parameters typically contain the full script path and script parameters, if needed.
        Specified by:
        getJobParams in interface ScriptModule
        Returns:
        Runtime.exec(String) parameters
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to build the job parameters

      • getScriptDir

        public File getScriptDir()
        Returns moduleDir/script which contains all scripts generated by the module.
        Specified by:
        getScriptDir in interface ScriptModule
        Returns:
        File directory containing all ScriptModule scripts

      • getSummary

        public String getSummary()
                  throws Exception
        Returns summary message to be displayed by Email module so must not contain confidential info. ModuleUtil provides summary metrics on output files
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • getTimeout

        public Integer getTimeout()
                   throws ConfigFormatException
        Default behavior is for scripts to run indefinitely (no timeout).
        Specified by:
        getTimeout in interface ScriptModule
        Returns:
        Number of minutes before script is cancelled due to timeout
